languages.text: "Затрудняюсь ответить, Ваша Светлость. Ксеносы бросили в атаку на него такие силы, что усиленная стража и оборонный периметр были сметены за несколько минут. Клянусь Троном, что бы они ни искали внутри, они не пожалели значительных сил, чтобы это достать!"

"Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"
languages.original_text: "Затрудняюсь ответить, Ваша Светлость. Ксеносы бросили в атаку на него такие силы, что усиленная стража и оборонный периметр были сметены за несколько минут. Клянусь Троном, что бы они ни искали внутри, они не пожалели значительных сил, чтобы это достать!"

traits.locale_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When it was time for the xenos to attack the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased guard and the defense perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

"Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When it was time for the xenos to attack the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased guard and the defense perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

"Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased guard and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

"Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased guard and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

"Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

languages.text: 「私にもわかりません、陛下。異種族が宮殿を襲撃した際、奴らは非常に大きな軍勢を送り込み、増員した監視兵と防衛境界線はものの数分で一掃されました。奴らが宮殿の何を狙っているのかわかりませんが、それを手に入れるためにあらゆる軍力を投資しているようです！」
languages.original_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

traits.locale_text: 「私にもわかりません、陛下。異種族が宮殿を襲撃した際、奴らは非常に大きな軍勢を送り込み、増員した監視兵と防衛境界線はものの数分で一掃されました。奴らが宮殿の何を狙っているのかわかりませんが、それを手に入れるためにあらゆる軍力を投資しているようです！」

languages.text: “很遗憾，我也不清楚，大人。突袭宫殿的异形部队极其强大，我们增派的守卫和外围防御部队，仅仅在几分钟内就被消灭殆尽。黄金王座在上，虽然不知道那些异形打算从你的宫殿里夺走什么，但他们是铁了心要得手！”
languages.original_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我也不清楚，大人。突袭宫殿的异形部队极其强大，我们增派的守卫和外围防御部队，仅仅在几分钟内就被消灭殆尽。黄金王座在上，虽然不知道那些异形打算从你的宫殿里夺走什么，但他们是铁了心要得手！”

languages.text: «Lo lamento, pero no lo sé, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Cuando los xenos atacaron el palacio, enviaron una fuerza tan grande como para aniquilar el perímetro defensivo y a los guardias de refuerzo en cuestión de minutos. Por el trono, ¡no sé lo que buscan allí, pero han lanzado todas sus fuerzas para obtenerlo!».
languages.original_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, pero no lo sé, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Cuando los xenos atacaron el palacio, enviaron una fuerza tan grande como para aniquilar el perímetro defensivo y a los guardias de refuerzo en cuestión de minutos. Por el trono, ¡no sé lo que buscan allí, pero han lanzado todas sus fuerzas para obtenerlo!».

languages.text: « Hélas, je l'ignore, Votre Seigneurie. Quand les xénos ont attaqué le palais, ils ont déployé tant de troupes que le périmètre de défense, pourtant soutenu par des renforts de gardiens, n'a résisté que quelques minutes. Par le Trône, je ne sais pas ce qu'ils cherchent dans le palais, mais ils ont envoyé tous les combattants à leur disposition pour mettre la main dessus ! »
languages.original_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, je l'ignore, Votre Seigneurie. Quand les xénos ont attaqué le palais, ils ont déployé tant de troupes que le périmètre de défense, pourtant soutenu par des renforts de gardiens, n'a résisté que quelques minutes. Par le Trône, je ne sais pas ce qu'ils cherchent dans le palais, mais ils ont envoyé tous les combattants à leur disposition pour mettre la main dessus ! »

languages.text: "Das weiß ich leider nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Als die Xenos den Palast angriffen, setzten sie so viele Truppen ein, dass auch die erhöhte Wächterpräsenz und die Verteidigungszone binnen Minuten ausgelöscht waren. Beim Thron, was immer sie da drinnen suchen, sie haben keine Mühe gescheut, um es in die Finger zu kriegen!"
languages.original_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

traits.locale_text: "Das weiß ich leider nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Als die Xenos den Palast angriffen, setzten sie so viele Truppen ein, dass auch die erhöhte Wächterpräsenz und die Verteidigungszone binnen Minuten ausgelöscht waren. Beim Thron, was immer sie da drinnen suchen, sie haben keine Mühe gescheut, um es in die Finger zu kriegen!"

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, cevabı ben de bilmiyorum. Zenolar saraya öyle büyük bir kuvvetle saldırdılar ki sayıları normalden fazla olan dizdarlar ve savunma hattı bile dakikalar içinde tarumar oldu. Taht şahidim, sarayda her ne arıyorlarsa bulmak için hiçbir şeyi esirgemediler!"
languages.original_text: "Alas, I don't know the answer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. When the xenos attacked the palace, they sent a force so great that the increased warden presence and the defence perimeter were wiped out in minutes. By the Throne, whatever they're looking for in there, they've spared no troops to get their hands on it!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, cevabı ben de bilmiyorum. Zenolar saraya öyle büyük bir kuvvetle saldırdılar ki sayıları normalden fazla olan muhafızlar ve savunma hattı bile dakikalar içinde tarumar oldu. Taht şahidim, orada her ne arıyorlarsa bulmak için hiçbir şeyi esirgemediler!"
